thread.title: Pregnant Binky Felstead confirms she's very much on with JP Paterson by sharing Valentine's snap in bed together
thread.title_full: Pregnant Binky Felstead confirms she's very much on with JP Paterson by sharing Valentine's snap in bed together

author: Vicki Newman
title: Pregnant Binky Felstead confirms she's very much on with JP Paterson by sharing Valentine's snap in bed together
text:
Pregnant Binky Felstead confirms she's very much on with JP Paterson by sharing Valentine's snap in bed together She wished her "baby daddy" a Happy Valentine's Day Share It looks like Binky and JP are back together (Photo: Instagram/binkyfelstead) Share Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
Pregnant Binky Felstead has made it clear that she's very much back on with JP Paterson. 
The Made In Chelsea star shared an intimate snap of her lying in bed with her man to wish him a Happy Valentine's Day. 
The pair, who both appear to be naked in the picture, are lying side by side and hiding under the covers. 
JP is staring lovingly at Binky and she's puckering up for a kiss. 
Posting the picture on Instagram, she wrote: "Happy Valentine's Day to this gorgeous baby daddy to be. Count myself very lucky to have you in my life". Read More Binky said the pregnancy has brought them closer together (Photo: Channel 4) 
Her fans were very pleased to see them back together. 
One commented, saying: "Perfect". 
"Soo cute, hope you 2 have an amazing Valentine's Day," said another. [sic] 
But others wondered if there was someone else involved in the sweet moment. 
"Who the f**k took this photo binks," asked one fan. 
But she made it clear they were alone. 
She went back and added to the caption, writing: "(it's a selfie stick guys! There isn't someone taking the picture in the bed with us!!)" Binky found fame in Made In Chelsea (Photo: Channel 4) Binky has been in an on-off relationship with JP (Photo: Rex Features) 
Binky recently said that her surprise pregnancy had brought her closer than ever to her on-off boyfriend. 
The reality star announced her pregnancy last month, saying although she and JP - real name Josh - weren’t currently a couple, they were committed to raising the baby together. 
But speaking to OK magazine , Binky suggested things may have changed, saying she and JP have been spending more time together than ever before. 
When asked if they could get back together, she said: “Absolutely. We’re getting on better than ever, so this news has actually been a real blessing. We’re better than we’ve been for a very long time and that wasn’t because of the baby. 
“We love each other and we’re having the most amazing time going on date nights and we’re very couple-ey. It’s really nice. We’ll see what happens.” The pair filmed Made In Chelsea together (Photo: WENN) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
